Mac noun
(MAN)
[ as form of address ] US informal used when speaking to a man whose name you do not know: Hey, Mac, watch where you're going!
Mac noun
(COMPUTER)
[ C ] trademark (also (Apple) Macintosh) a brand name for a common type of computer: You can write up your report on the Mac.
